channel.title: [Matrix] Please help me! Two quick question. Help!
channel.description:
Ok so I have two quick questions, I am just going to get to the point on this. 1. Where do I go and edit to change things in my quest tab? 2. Where do I go and edit so when you thieve from a stall, you get something and get xp. All it says when I do it is "Nothing interesting happens".
Help would be appreciated and rewarded with a rep++.
Thanks! :)

item.title: [Matrix] Please help me! Two quick question. Help!

item.description:
@bigballers wrote:

Well from when I actually played moparscape (Hellzend what not) it was in client.java but I would persume they fixed the filing system so look at ObjectHandler.

And once again, check out your InterfaceHandler or client.java

Lol sorry i havent downloaded the source, but I will just for you lol.

And no, I dont need rep either just wanna help.

Read full topic
